playn.core
Interface Image.Region

All Superinterfaces:
Image
All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageRegionGL
Enclosing interface:
Image
public static interface Image.Region
extends Image

A subregion of an image. See Image.subImage(float, float, float, float).

Image.BitmapTransformer, Image.Region

Method Detail

x

float x()
The x offset (in pixels) of this subimage into its parent image.

y

float y()
The y offset (in pixels) of this subimage into its parent image.

setBounds

void setBounds(float x,
               float y,
               float width,
               float height)
Updates this region's bounds in its parent image. If you need a rapidly changing region of an image, this can be more efficient than repeatedly creating new subimages as it creates no garbage to be collected.

parent

Image parent()
The image of which this subimage is part.
